column2: That's a dark bad place, if half the tales be true.
column3: Daddy Twofoot on the [[Old Forest]]<ref name="ALEP"/>}}</center>

column2: Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] in the late [[Third Age]].

column1: Daddy Twofoot lived in a hole on [[Bagshot Row]] in [[Hobbiton]], right next door to [[Gaffer Gamgee
column2: Hamfast Gamgee]] and his family. He was a regular at the [[Ivy Bush
column3: Ivy Bush Inn]], where he was one particular evening in {{TA
column4: 3001}}, when Hamfast Gamgee entertained his fellow patrons with his knowledge of [[Bag End]] and "[[Bilbo Baggins
column5: Mad Baggins]]". During the conversation, Daddy showed some disdain for [[Buckland]]ers, considering them peculiar strangers.<ref name="ALEP">{{FR

column4: Daddy Twofoot in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'']]

column1: '''1981: [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]]:'''

column1: :Daddy Twofoot is voiced by [[Leonard Fenton]]. He is present in the Ivy Bush before [[Bilbo's Farewell Party
column2: Bilbo's Birthday Party]].<ref>[[Michael Bakewell]], [[Brian Sibley]] (eds.), [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column3: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], "[[A Long Expected Party (episode)

column1: '''2001: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'':'''
:Daddy Twofoot's place at the conversation (which is moved to the [[Green Dragon]]) is taken over by [[Samwise Gamgee
column2: Sam]].<ref>[[Peter Jackson]], [[Philippa Boyens]], [[Fran Walsh]] (eds.), [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column3: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]], "[[At the Green Dragon]]"</ref> A [[Decipher Card]] of Daddy Twofoot identifies him as one of the Hobbits seen in the preceding scene, ''[[Concerning Hobbits (scene)

column1: '''2002: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]]:'''

column1: :Daddy Twofoot lives at Number Two, [[Bagshot Row]], and can be seen sitting outside the Green Dragon. No actor is specified for the part.<ref>''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)]], "The Shire"</ref>
